      • validate

        public int validate()
        Traverse the configuration tree and validate the structure of the tree
        Returns:
        the number of errors detected

      • validate

        public void validate(List<String> errorsList,
                     Name root,
                     boolean validateDescendants,
                     boolean isMPTDescendant)
        Parameters:
        errorsList - List of validation errors
        root - root of the configuration subtree
        validateDescendants - Set it to 'true' if the whole configuration sub-tree is to be validated
        isMPTDescendant - if this configuration is descendant of the MessageProcessingTemplateConfiguration

      • generateReport

        public String generateReport()
        Generated an error report containing all errors encountered during validation. After the report has been generated and returned the error list will be cleared.
        Returns:
        A report containing all validation errors

      • generateReport

        public String generateReport(List<String> errorsList)
        Generated an error report containing all errors encountered during validation. After the report has been generated and returned the error list will be cleared.
        Parameters:
        errorsList - List of error
        Returns:
        report containing all validation errors
